entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Snow level 700 metres. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then rain. Rain mixed with snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Snow level at valley bottom. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
